original_text:
“Woe to him who builds his palace by unrighteousness,
    his upper rooms by injustice,
making his own people work for nothing,
    not paying them for their labor.
korean_text: 불의로 그 집을 세우며 부정하게 그 다락방을 지으며 자기의 이웃을 고용하고 그의 품삯을 주지 아니하는 자에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: Woe to him who builds his palace by unrighteousness
sentences.korean_translation: 불의로 자기 궁궐을 짓는 자에게 화 있으리라

sentences.original_text: making his own people work for nothing
not paying them for their labor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 노력에 대한 값을 지불하지 않는다
